body_html:
Check pseudo code in tensorflow/python/training/session_run_hook.py file line 78.
May be the bug is because the 'OutOfRange``exception is not raised but instead is allowed to gracefully break.

When OutOfRange error is raised the loop breaks instead of raising exception.

body:
Check pseudo code in  `tensorflow/python/training/session_run_hook.py` file line 78.
May be the bug is because the 'OutOfRange``exception is not raised but instead is allowed to gracefully break.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2289914/35240089-a3397d64-ffb2-11e7-9602-5d07306c35ac.png)

When `OutOfRange` error is raised the loop breaks instead of raising exception.
